text: Thank Me Later is the first studio album by Canadian rapper and singer Drake. Thank Me Later was released on June 15, 2010. The album appeared at number 1 on the US Billboard 200 chart. It sold 447,000 copies in the United States in its first week. It received mostly positive reviews from music critics. ==Songs== ==References== Category:2010 albums Category:Debut albums Category:Drake (musician) albums Category:Cash Money Records albums Category:Hip hop albums Category:Pop albums Category:R&B; albums Category:Young Money Entertainment albums
title: Thank Me Later
